title: Agent Knowledge Packs
summary: Defines a standardized mechanism for assembling Agent Knowledge Packs (AKPs) that materialize session-relevant knowledge from AgentContext, ConversationContext, and Mode into a stable, consumable structure.
key_points: AKPs expose session and consumable knowledge lanes
DDR consumption fields are resolved during AKP creation
PKP renders generically and attaches tool schemas
AKPs may change between turns by design
